updates_title: သတင်းနှင့် အပ်ဒိတ်များ
updates_subtitle: နောက်ဆုံးရ သတင်းများ၊ အစီရင်ခံစာများနှင့် ကြေညာချက်များ
loading: အသစ်များကို ဖတ်နေသည်…
load_more: နောက်ထပ် ဖတ်ရန်
no_updates: အသစ်များ မရှိသေးပါ
search_placeholder: အသစ်များ ရှာရန်
no_updates_body: ကျွန်ုပ်တို့၏အစီအစဉ်များနှင့် ငွေကြေးအစီရင်ခံစာများအပေါ် နောက်ဆုံးရ အပ်ဒိတ်များကို ထုတ်ပြန်ပါသည်။ မကြာမီပြန်လည်စစ်ဆေးပါ။
home_hero: Together for Sustainable Development — supporting resilient communities in Chin State
home_lead: Together for Sustainable Development (TSD) aims to promote sustainable development in remote communities in southern Chin State. We have a particular focus on sustainable education – and by this we mean life-long and life-sustaining education: from children in school, to farmers trying new methods in the field, to women’s groups learning to run cooperatives, and more! Addressing the interconnected problems faced in these communities, we also aim to improve food security, promote inclusion, and meet urgent needs in times of crisis. Learn more about who we are.
home_motto: Together we can build a sustainable future
stats_communities_disaster: Communities with disaster committees & better prepared for crises
project_water_body: Locally managed water systems, latrine construction, and hygiene training reduce water-borne illness and improve attendance at schools and clinics.
project_agro_body: Agroforestry demonstrations, tree nurseries, and farmer training improve soil health, diversify income, and strengthen food security for smallholder households.
project_health_body: Training and equipping local community health workers improves basic primary care, maternal and child health, and timely referral pathways.
trust_1_body: Programs are co-created with local leaders and reflect community priorities and traditional knowledge.
trust_2_body: Annual reports, activity summaries, and financial statements are published for accountability.
trust_3_body: We collaborate with local organisations and donors committed to sustainable, long-term partnerships.
stats_people_relief: People provided with relief items during disasters
programme_education_body: Supporting life-long and life-sustaining education from early years through adult learning, including school support and community education activities.
programme_food_body: Practical farming support, agroforestry, and diversified livelihoods to improve nutrition and household income.
programme_inclusion_body: Promoting equitable participation and supporting women's self-help groups, cooperatives, and community leadership.
programme_relief_body: Preparedness, response, and distribution of relief items during emergencies together with community disaster committees.
testimonial_quote: “Participating in this programme has been a turning point for me. It has given me new skills and hope for the future.
contact_main_office: Main Office: Lailenpi Town, Chin State, Myanmar
